name: Kpop Double Play
description:
Can you play 2 KPOP games at the same time?
As a game about Kpop, this game feature a lot of mini Kpop game:
// Hear music, guess the song name
// Watch screen shot, guess the MV name
// Find an idol as order. But watch out, they're moving!
// Drag and Drop the correct name to idol
// Knowlead about Kpop - just pick Yes or No
// Do you know how old are they? Let do some age comparison
// Who appear most on the screen?
// Use your finger to control the chibi avoiding the rain drop
// Tap to jump to avoid dangerous virus
